extendedInfo.description: This is the free demo version of Write Draw Share if you enjoy please try the full version.Write, Draw, Share, it's that easy.Why send a pain old text message or social media post when you can add your own personalized touch? Hand Written Notes allows you to easily create a special note for that loved one to cherish. Great for kids to send special notes and pictures drawn by them to friends and family.With one touch you are on your way to sharing your personalized message to that special someone or to the whole world, let your imagination run wild.Please try the full version.https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.currie.writedrawshare

reviews.title: I love this app!
reviews.comment: What a great way to send a personalized note to friends or family. It\'s a great way for the kids to send their artistic achievements to family near and far. I definitely recommend this app!
reviews.author: tracy purcell
